description:
Franky and Nami come up with a plan to stop Chopper`s rampage, but it could prove deadly to the not-so-little reindeer. Usopp and Zoro are thrilled to finally be free of each other!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La détermination de Nami ! Carton sur le Chopper enragé
Nami no Ketsudan! Bousou Chopper o Ute!
Nami`s Decision! Fire at the Out-of-Control Chopper!
Уверенность Нами! Выстрел в обезумевшего Чоппера!
ナミの決断! 暴走チョッパーを撃て!
